sn14.32:4.2: “Mendicants, I went in search of the earth element’s gratification, and I found it. I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of gratification in the earth element.
sn14.32:4.3: I went in search of the earth element’s drawback, and I found it. I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of the drawback in the earth element.
sn14.32:4.4: I went in search of escape from the earth element, and I found it. I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of escape from the earth element.
sn14.32:5.1: I went in search of the water element’s gratification …
sn14.32:5.2: I went in search of the fire element’s gratification …
sn14.32:5.3: I went in search of the air element’s gratification …
sn14.32:6.1: As long as I didn’t truly understand these four elements’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I didn’t announce my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.
sn14.32:7.1: But when I did truly understand the four elements’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I announced my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.
sn14.32:7.2: Knowledge and vision arose in me:
sn14.32:7.3: ‘My freedom is unshakeable; this is my final birth; now there are no more future lives.’”
